page.title: 11An Agricultural Engineer
page.content: We went to John to see what his job was about. As we went into the yard we saw an employee putting a tyre on a tractor. Then we saw two welding machines with special goggles and masks, and some H shaped girders which were cut in half ready for building a steel barn. His main job is welding steel girder structures. He showed us a sort of mangle which bent metal bars. He is also good at changing uses for machines. He likes his job very much and he will do anything possible with the tools he has. His hobby is cross-country on a motor bike. His hopes for the future are to carry on doing what he is doing at the moment.
